Text: It gives to me a Launcher error; Unable to open archive file
you people know that this game was released by the devs and its broken intentionally right?

I just deleted the Game Dev Tycoon folder from "C:UsersyournameAppDataLocal" before installing this game and I received an achievement in game for buying the game.

I'll comment in a few hours with a screenshot letting everyone know if it's real or fake.

Alright, just played for a bit, I got this message, which I got the first time I played the game, too.

http://i.imgur.com/3QHsYqR.png

Then I got the message about someone making mods for my game, which I got last time too.

http://i.imgur.com/AIPrfFl.jpg

Then, just when I thought I was doing well, BOOM.

http://i.imgur.com/HVrTZMc.jpg

Yep, this is the copy of the game with the anti pirate message. I'll try a couple more, because I'd like to play the game all the way through before purchasing it as soon as it becomes available on Steam. If I cannot do that, I won't be buying the game at full price.
And to think The_Duck1 doesn't only have a pink emblem, but also has uploaded torrents to TPB for 2+ years. Oh well.

This is a broken copy. I received this pop up after a short time playing the game.

http://i.imgur.com/HVrTZMc.jpg
I appologize for the comments. If you receive a message saying people are playing an "illegal" copy of your game and not "pirated" copies, your copy is good. I'm sorry The_Duck1! D:
